abstract: The Chinese state-owned mining company Minmetals Resources has offered to buy Equinox Minerals of Canada for about $6.5 billion in cash.
snippet: The Chinese state-owned mining company Minmetals Resources has offered to buy Equinox Minerals of Canada for about $6.5 billion in cash.

headline.main: Minmetals Resources Bids $6.5 Billion for Equinox Minerals
